thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Under Construction
thread.title_full: Under Construction - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: NotATravelNewbie
title: Under Construction
text: This hotel is presently under construction, but it didn't hinder our stay. We stayed here for less than one day to catch an early morning flight. Our room was very nice and clean. We are Marriott Gold members so we were given a generous upgrade at check-in. The restaurant was fine, the food was not bad, the menu was typical boring Protea fare. The TV picture was not very clear, but who really cares? I would stay here again.
